IP_SYN_3_style_7:
[Indication]
Airway stent obstruction, resolving mediastinal mass.
[Anesthesia]
General, LMA/Rigid.
[Description]
Rigid bronchoscopy used to remove tracheal Y-stent (foreign body). Flexible bronchoscopy with cryotherapy performed to debulk granulation tissue in the left mainstem. Airway patency restored.
[Plan]
Admit to pediatric ward.
